resources.string: 1500+ novels for free. \n Only $4.2 per month
Sign in for better reading experience.
Tips: Single novel costs $6 in other Reading apps.
If you can\'t find the book you want here, let us know. We will update for you soon, VIP priority.

Your VIP Membership will become effective in 24 hours after your purchase. · Payment: The purchase will be charged through your GooglePlay account. · Renewal: Your subscription will renew automatically. Youmay be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginningof each VIP Membership period until you cancel your subscription. · Cancellation: You can cancel a subscription at any time and atleast 24 hours beforet our renewal date on Google Play Store-> Subscriptions ->Flying Lines. · Subscribers of VIP Membership can claim the VIP DailyBonus by visiting Flying Lines APP every day during the subscription period. · Advance Chapter Privilege: Only VIP users are given early access to subscriptions of a selection of VIP novels. · VIP Membership\'s actual deduction is decided by Google.Monthly VIP Membership is effective for 30 days.
If you continue,you agree the Services Agreement & Privacy Policy
